input.sentences: we took a trip to see the waterfalls .
the view was amazing from where we were .
you could feel the mist from the falls from where we were standing .
the water falls could be seen from miles away .
once we got closer to the water falls we seen a lot of wildlife | including this butterfly .
output.sentences: The couple stopped to see many waterfalls on their trip.
The view of this waterfall from above is amazing.
Standing in the mist, they feel overcome with the beauty of nature.
Drawn to the water, the couple traveled for many miles to view the falls.
The wildlife is also drawn to water, like this butterfly they see in the parking lot.
